result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Lisa A. Perry

defendant.name: Perry, Lisa A.
defendant.address: 751 Co. Rd. K, Taycheedah Correctional Institution, Fond du Lac, WI 54935-9909

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: of Proceedings.  Plea & Sentencing held on May 7, 2010

Defendant Lisa A. Perry in court, in custody with attorney Jill L. Laufenberg.  Ralph M Uttke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court calls 9CF230, 10CF1, & 10CF22. Plea advisement given to Judge.  State gives plea agreement, 9CF230 Ct 1 dismissed, 10CF1 ct 1 & 2 dismissed & read in, 10CF22 ct 1 dismissed, ct 2 plea.  9CF230 imposed & stayed 7 years prision, 4 3 3 years probation,   10 CF22 4 yrs confinement, 2 years e supervision, with conditions & no credit. Atty Laufenberg gives statement that credit was given on 08 Case.  Free to argue on initial confinement on 10CF22.  Def. agrees to plea agreement.  9CF230 ct 2 Poss of Drg Paraph Compound, Convert, as Party to crime,& 2nd offense Guilty plea, ct 1 Dismissed, 10CF22, ct 2 Purchase Pseud. for Another 2nd offense, Def. admits prior conviction, ct 2 Guilty plea, ct 1 Dismissed 10CF1 Dismissed & Restitution of $40 to be read in.  DA & Atty Laufenberg no waiver of p.h. & information not filed.  09CF230 & 10CF22, Atty Laufenberg & def. waives p.h.  Court accepts waiver of p.h. & finds probable cause.  Recess so State can get information's.  State advised court that information was already filed on 9CF230 & files information on 10CF22.  Atty Laufenberg has copy of information's in 9CF230 & 10CF22 & waives reading of information & enters Guilty pleas already completed.  Def. still admits prior convictions.  9CF230 ct 2 Guilty plea, 10CF22 ct 2 Guilty plea. Def. advised of constitutional rights & J.T. rights.  Atty Laufenberg is satisfied & factual basis.  Court finds plea is freely & voluntarily given & accepts pleas & finds def. Guilty 9CF230, ct 2 as charged, & 10CF22, ct 2 as charged.  State gives sentencing argument in 10CF22.  Atty Laufenberg gives sentencing argument in 10CF22.  State gives brief responds. Atty Laufenberg gives brief responds.  State replys.  Tim Orthmann makes statement.  Def. makes statement.  Court orders on 
09CF230 ct 2 Imposed 7 yrs prison 4 yrs initial confinement & 3 yrs extended supervision, & stays & orders 3 years probation, consecutive to 10CF22, AODA & follow througth, costs & Restitution $40
10CF22 ct 2 5 yrs prison  3 yrs initial confinement &  2 years extended supervision with conditions AODA, Absolute Sobriety & costs.  Initial Confinement to comm. immediately & concurrent with 7CF152.  No Credit for time served.
9CF230 & 10 CF22 Def is eligible for Challenge Program & Earn Releas Program.  Def will attend risk reducation program.  Court will order Risk Reducation Program.
Def. advised of postconviction rights, voting rights & firearm rights.
Ad Prosequendum and Order to Institution (copy) See 09CF230

ADDRESS INFO for Lisa A. Perry
